detectors.description:
GpyxToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#761-779) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#771)
detectors.markdown:
[GpyxToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#L761-L779) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#L771)

detectors.description:
GpyxToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#627-668) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= expiry,GPYX::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#666)
detectors.markdown:
[GpyxToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GpyxToken.sol#L627-L668) uses timestamp for comparisons
